recipesJson.name: Shipper Menthol
recipesJson.author: foxda
recipesJson.description: A recipe named after my friend, nicknamed "Shipper". He likes his menthols and this is what got him off the smokes for good.

reviews.text: Up until five minutes ago, my nose was completely clogged up; could hardly breathe and can't smell a thing. Can't taste anything either, but this is a life saver at the moment! Thanks for the recipe, and I'll let you know how it tastes as soon as that sense comes back to me.
